name: linseed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of flax plant (= a plant with blue flowers) or the seed of this plant, which can be eaten as food and used to produce oil that is used for making some materials and for protecting wood : I prefer bread with whole grains or seeds (soya and linseed). They would rub their cricket bats with linseed. You can grind up your own whole linseeds or flaxseeds (they're the same thing). Compare
flaxseedSee also
